roleset.name: cause an emotional reaction

role.descr: thing provoked (or reaction when a seperate secondary impelled agent is present
secondary impelled agent, when separate from reaction

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: The provocation of rumors and slander by some foreign reactionary organizations

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to provoke.01. Provoke.01 is a member of VN classes amuse-31.1 and engender-27. Framed by Katie.
